ingredients: 1 1/4 cup of hot boiling water (place teaspoon of coffee in hot water)
instructions: Mix everything together in the Kitchen Aid. Add 3 whole eggs, ¼ cup of freshly squeezed
orange juice and one teaspoon of vanilla sugar.
- Spread a little margarine in the pan. Pour mixture in the pan and place in oven on 350˚ for 55 minutes.
